TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValueTask extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTask>
Public Structure ValueTask Implements IEquatable(Of ValueTask)

summary.span: 提供异步操作的可等待结果。

span.span: Provides an awaitable result of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ValueTask`实例可以等待或使用转换为 。A `ValueTask` instance may either be awaited or converted to a using . `ValueTask`实例仅可等待一次，并且 在实例完成之前，使用者可能不会调用。A `ValueTask` instance may only be awaited once, and consumers may not call until the instance has completed. 如果这些限制不可接受，请 `ValueTask` 通过调用将转换为 。If these limitations are unacceptable, convert the `ValueTask` to a by calling . 永远不应对实例执行以下操作 `ValueTask` ：The following operations should never be performed on a `ValueTask` instance: - 等待实例多次。Awaiting the instance multiple times. - 多次调用。Calling multiple times. - 使用多种方法来使用此实例。Using more than one of these techniques to consume the instance. 如果执行上述任一操作，则结果是不确定的。If you do any of the above, the results are undefined. `ValueTask`是可包装 或实例的结构 。A `ValueTask` is a structure that can wrap either a or a instance. 如果返回一个 `ValueTask` 从异步方法包装实例的，则会 启用高吞吐量应用程序，以避免使用可重用对象池进行分配 。Returning a `ValueTask` that wraps a instance from an asynchronous method enables high-throughput applications to avoid allocations by using a pool of reusable objects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[了解原因和 ValueTask](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/understanding-the-whys-whats-and-whens-of-valuetask/)的内容。For more information, see [Understanding the Whys, Whats, and Whens of ValueTask](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/dotnet/understanding-the-whys-whats-and-whens-of-valuetask/). 使用 `ValueTask` 而不是会 引入一些开销。Using a `ValueTask` instead of a introduces some overhead. 由于 `ValueTask` 是具有多个字段的结构，因此从方法返回它将导致复制更多的数据，并返回一个 引用。Because `ValueTask` is a structure with multiple fields, returning it from the method results in copying more data compared to returning a single reference. 因此，不返回结果的任何异步方法的默认选择都应该是返回 。As such, the default choice for any asynchronous method that does not return a result should be to return a . 仅当性能分析证明需要使用时，才应 `ValueTask` 使用，而不是 。Only if performance analysis proves it worthwhile should a `ValueTask` be used instead of a . 此属性应该用于在方法返回成功完成的情况下，手动返回已成功完成的单一实例 。The property should be used to hand back a successfully completed singleton in the case where a method returning a completes synchronously and successfully. > [!NOTE] > 支持使用类型， `ValueTask` 从 c # 7.0 开始，不受 Visual Basic 的任何版本支持。The use of the `ValueTask` type is supported starting with C# 7.0 and is not supported by any version of Visual Basic.
